summary: Bringing Machine Learning to Web 3 - With our revolutionary federated learning approach, you can now train machine learning models collaboratively without having to share your source data. Our system ensures a publicly verifiable audit trail, so you can be confident that your data remains secure and untouched throughout the process. Every internode transaction is securely recorded on the blockchain, ensuring complete data integrity. We believe in incentivizing participation! Get rewarded for contributing to the collaborative process and have peace of mind with pre-defined smart contracts. Machine Learning model updates are efficiently transmitted across different clients, by integrating advanced model compression and hyper-network approaches.
